Articles.Content:
I remember an old game for the original XBOX that featured a external control panel that had like 100 or-so buttons on it, and you could literally commit suicide by flipping any number of them. The game involved pilotting a Mech-device around what looked like an airbase. I never really made it past the airbase/military base part so... However, I do remember the fact there was a key that dangled from it that had to be inserting into a keyhole and turned to relase the lock on a little flip-up hatch that contained a big red \'EJECT\' button. If anyone knows what this game was and hwere I could buy another copy, that\'d be useful.

Thanks.

Not familiar with any external control panels, but it might have been a Mech Warrior game, or an Armored Core game.

Those are the only ones I can remember that have you pilot giant mechs.
It\'s Steel Battalion. I would guess E-Bay or Amazon would be good places to look?
